title: ICLR Paper accepted!
content: Our paper on Post-hoc Probabilistic Vision-Language Models (BayesVLM) has been accepted to ICLR 2026. Check out the [paper](https://openreview.net/forum?id=XLiUcvHfzS)

title: CVPR Workshop on Uncertainty Quantification for Computer Vision.
content: Together with collegues we organised the [4th Workshop on Uncertainty Quantification for Computer Vision at CVPR 2025](https://uncertainty-cv.github.io/2025/).

title: UAI Paper accepted!
content: Our BitVI paper has been accepted to UAI 2025. Check out the [paper](https://openreview.net/pdf?id=nbsaJUjHQl), the code will be released soon.

title: ICLR Paper accepted!
content: Our paper on Streamlining paper has been accepted to ICLR 2025. Check out the [paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2411.18425) and the library [here](https://github.com/AaltoML/SUQ).
